long_description: The women's Patagonia Traverse jacket offers breathable, quick-drying, 4-way stretch in a tough design that's capable of taking on wet weather and your favorite running trails. Recycled polyester blended with spandex offers comfortable 4-way stretch, resists wind and dries quickly. Deluge(R) Durable Water Repellent finish causes water to bead up and roll off, fending off light rain showers and snow. Strategic seam placement with minimal bulk for unrestricted movement. Full-length zipper features a windflap for increased protection; tall collar with zipper garage increases comfort. Long sleeves provide extra coverage for hands. Slightly dropped tail increases coverage. The women's Patagonia Traverse jacket closely fits the body to maximize performance.
short_description: The women's Patagonia Traverse jacket offers breathable, quick-drying, 4-way stretch in a tough design that's capable of taking on wet weather and your favorite running trails.
